## SendableEthersGivety class

Ethers-based implementation of [SendableGivety](./lib-base.sendablegivety.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SendableEthersGivety implements SendableGivety<EthersTransactionReceipt, EthersTransactionResponse>
```

|  [borrowGUSD(amount, maxBorrowingRate, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.borrowgusd.md) |  | Adjust existing Trove by borrowing more GUSD. |

|  [closeTrove(overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.closetrove.md) |  | Close existing Trove by repaying all debt and withdrawing all collateral. |
|  [depositCollateral(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.depositcollateral.md) |  | Adjust existing Trove by depositing more collateral. |

|  [exitLiquidityMining(overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.exitliquiditymining.md) |  | Withdraw all staked LP tokens from liquidity mining and claim reward. |
|  [liquidate(address, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.liquidate.md) |  | Liquidate one or more undercollateralized Troves. |
|  [liquidateUpTo(maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.liquidateupto.md) |  | Liquidate the least collateralized Troves up to a maximum number. |
|  [openTrove(params, maxBorrowingRateOrOptionalParams, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.opentrove.md) |  | Open a new Trove by depositing collateral and borrowing GUSD. |
|  [redeemGUSD(amount, maxRedemptionRate, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.redeemgusd.md) |  | Redeem GUSD to native currency (e.g. Give) at face value. |
|  [registerFrontend(kickbackRate, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.registerfrontend.md) |  | Register current wallet address as a Givety frontend. |
|  [repayGUSD(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.repaygusd.md) |  | Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt. |
|  [sendGVTY(toAddress, amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.sendgvty.md) |  | Send GVTY tokens to an address. |
|  [sendGUSD(toAddress, amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.sendgusd.md) |  | Send GUSD tokens to an address. |
|  [stakeGVTY(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.stakegvty.md) |  | Stake GVTY to start earning fee revenue or increase existing stake. |
|  [stakeGivTokens(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.stakeunitokens.md) |  | Stake GiveSwap GIVE/GUSD LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn GVTY. |
|  [transferCollateralGainToTrove(overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.transfercollateralgaintotrove.md) |  | Transfer [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Trove. |
|  [unstakeGVTY(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.unstakegvty.md) |  | Withdraw GVTY from staking. |
|  [unstakeGivTokens(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.unstakeunitokens.md) |  | Withdraw GiveSwap GIVE/GUSD LP tokens from liquidity mining. |
|  [withdrawCollateral(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.withdrawcollateral.md) |  | Adjust existing Trove by withdrawing some of its collateral. |
|  [withdrawGainsFromStabilityPool(overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.withdrawgainsfromstabilitypool.md) |  | Withdraw [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [GVTY reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.gvtyreward.md) from Stability Deposit. |
|  [withdrawGainsFromStaking(overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.withdrawgainsfromstaking.md) |  | Withdraw [collateral gain](./lib-base.gvtystake.collateralgain.md) and [GUSD gain](./lib-base.gvtystake.gusdgain.md) from GVTY stake. |
|  [withdrawGVTYRewardFromLiquidityMining(overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.withdrawgvtyrewardfromliquiditymining.md) |  | Withdraw GVTY that has been earned by mining liquidity. |
|  [withdrawGUSDFromStabilityPool(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.withdrawgusdfromstabilitypool.md) |  | Withdraw GUSD from Stability Deposit. |
